description: A hh3cEponUniLinkUpTrap notification is sent
when the UNI up event is detected
and the transmitting switch is turned on.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniLinkUpTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniIndex i 9999 HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniAdminStatus i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The index value which uniquely identifies the FE(fast Ethernet)
interface of the ONU.
variables.name: HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the interface. This
string should include the name of the manufacturer, the product name
and the version of the interface hardware and software.
variables.name: HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniDescr

description: The desired state of the user network interface. When a managed
system initializes, all user network interfaces start with down(2)
state. The testing(3)state indicates that no operational packets
can be passed. As a result of either explicit management action or
per configuration information retained by the managed system
hh3cEponUniAdminStatus is then changed to either the up(1) or
testing(3) states (or remains in the down(2) state).
variables.name: HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniAdminStatus

description: A hh3cEponUniLinkDownTrap notification is sent
when the UNI down event is detected
and the transmitting switch is turned on.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniLinkDownTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniIndex i 9999 HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniAdminStatus i 1

variables.name: HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniDescr

variables.name: HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniAdminStatus

description: A hh3cEponUniLoopBackDetectedTrap notification is sent
when the UNI loopback event is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniLoopBackDetectedTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniIndex i 9999 HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniVlan i 9999

variables.name: HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniDescr

description: If the function is not supported
the default value 0 will be returned.
Unit:decibel(db).
variables.name: HH3C-EPON-UNI-MIB::hh3cEponUniVlan

description: A hh3cEponUniLoopBackRecoveredTrap notification is sent
when the UNI loopback is recovered.
